item.title: I Used AI to Do All of My Holiday Shopping
item.description: Chatbots aren't very good at picking gifts, but that didn't stop me from burning the planet in a quest for the perfect baking equipment.

item.title: Why Canâ€™t You Switch Seats in an Empty Airplane?
item.description: Yes, the weight distribution on an aircraft really does affect how well it flies. Our physics guy explains.

item.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Review: Fortune and Glory
item.description: A combination of puzzle-solving, bare-knuckle boxing, and brilliant performances recall the best of Indy's adventures.

item.title: 21 WIRED-Tested Gifts for People Who Need Some Sleep (2024)
item.description: Sweet dreams are made of these, from special lamps to noise machines.

item.title: 'Batman: Arkham Shadow' Proves VR Gaming Isn't Just a Gimmick
item.description: The latest Batman outing for Meta Quest shows that, when done well, VR gaming can hold its own with any platform.
